profile:
We are Action Home Services, and we always take action for every construction service that you need. Based in Toronto, Ontario, we are a general contracting company that specializes in a wide range of services. We will help you to design and build an outside living area of your dream. Do not wait! Take action with Action Home Services. Check our website at http://actionhomeservices.ca/ to find out more. 

Our Mission
We aim to become one of the most successful construction companies within Toronto, Ontario. This mission will not happen if our services are not up to the level of what our customers are expecting. Thus our main aim is to provide the best services to our customers. Our level of professionalism will become our barometer for customer satisfaction. We also aim to make it a point to have strong ties with our customers so we can grow the level of our professionalism and gain more trust among our clients.

Our Vision
Our dream is to become the one-stop shop for any kind of construction service that any of our clients need. We initially started with interlocking and asphalt paving, but we are now venturing into other services such as landscaping, pressure washing and sealing, concreting, decks and fences, demolition services and many more. We already have a wide range of service offerings, but we are not satisfied with just these. We are excited about every project that we perform and our possibilities for improvement and additional services are endless.

Our Commitment 
We commit to do whatever it takes to achieve the level of satisfaction our customer deserves. Our workmanship will leave a lasting mark and one that will be a reminder of our professionalism and close ties with our clients. We gained the trust of our customers through hard work that pays off when we see our clients happy with the outcome of our services. We will strive to be cooperative and readily available for any queries or requests our customer needs.

profile:
Beaver Paving Ltd. is a full service asphalt paving and Interlocking company. Established in 1980, Beaver  Paving Ltd. has been operating as family run business for over 35 years. With the original owner who continues to oversee and be involved with all aspects of the business, they have earned a reputation as being an exemplary company who excels in providing quality performance and customer service.
 
OUR GUARANTEE 
Beaver Paving Ltd ,we individually design and engineer your driveway using the highest quality materials combining expertise with experience. Although residential driveways and commercial lot designs and projects may vary from client to client, specifications and skill are always guaranteed to be consistent; from the biggest job to the smallest. 
Beaver Paving provides a full 12 month written guarantee with every contract.
 
Our Services Include: 
*Residential Paving 
*Commercial Paving 
*Asphalt Paving Contracting 
*Driveway Extensions 
*Sub-base Excavation 
*Grading Work, Regrading and Compacting 
*Interlocking Work 
*Concrete Floors and Pads 
*Walkway Reconstruction 
*Parking Lots 
*Industrial Lots 
*Commercial Plazas 
*Condominium Laneways 
*Grinding / Pulverizing 
*Resurfacing 
*Patch Work 
*Asphalt Grindings 
*Catch Basin Installations 
*Painted Line Markings 
*Rural Laneways

profile:
Paving, Interlocking, Concrete
M.n.B. Paving Ltd. offers a full range of hardscaping services including interlocking, steps and walls, pool decks and surrounds, asphalt and concrete.

Commercial
We understand that you want to work with a company that cares as much about your property as you do. Here’s why you should consider M.n.B. as your partner:

Experienced

We have over 27 years of experience, helping homeowners and businesses create the landscape of their dreams. We’ve created the perfect design in all types of conditions and have the happy customers to prove it.

Our team is experienced in all aspects of landscape design and build projects, including interlocking stone, retaining walls, asphalt and concrete work, and putting the finishing touches on pools.

Professional

Using the best products on the market, backed by the latest technology and machines, our team is meticulous about your project. We prepare your site, carefully perform the installation, and always clean up after ourselves. Our workers conduct themselves with the utmost professionalism, because we know we’re working where you live.

Quality, built to last

We’re committed to creating the environment you’ve been dreaming about, one that will improve your curb appeal, and leave a lasting impression. Each project is closely monitored for quality, and the company owner is involved in your project from start to finish to ensure your satisfaction.

M.n.B. Paving is a member of the Better Business Bureau with an A+ rating.
services:
Our goal is to create a beautiful and functional landscape, whatever your need.

Commercial
We work with you to determine traffic patterns, living spaces, and focal areas of your landscape. We begin your project with a properly prepared base that’s compacted, leveled and graded; then proceed to build the landscape according to your approved design.

We offer the following services, which allow us to fully address all your landscaping needs. Click on any link for more information, and to see samples of our work.

Steps and Wall

Interlocking Pavers

Landscaping and Patios

Poolside Landscaping

Asphalt and Concrete
name: M.N.B. Paving Ltd.

profile:
Whether you need to repair, replace or build something entirely new, VIP Paving & Contracting LTD has got you covered. Targeting all of the GTA we have been in business for over 20 years, specializing in asphalt, interlock, concrete, and more.
VIP Paving has completed many residential and commercial projects both large and small, with a focus on the quality of workmanship, service and dedication. While offering competitive pricing, our projects are completed to the customer’s 100% satisfaction by some of the top skilled tradesmen in the area.

profile:
* NO DEPOSITS ARE REQUIRED for RESIDENTIAL ASPHALT PAVING OF DRIVEWAYS. 

* NO DEPOSITS ARE REQUIRED for most INTERLOCKING STONE INSTALLATIONS.


PROUDLY SERVING : VAUGHAN, Concord, Thornhill, Maple, Woodbridge, Kleinburg, RICHMOND HILL, OAK RIDGES, MARKHAM, SCARBOROUGH, MISSISSAUGA, BRAMPTON, YORK REGION, KING CITY, AURORA, WHITCHURCH-STOUFFVILLE, BALLANTRAE, CEDAR VALLEY, NEWMARKET, NORTH YORK, EAST YORK, ETOBICOKE,TORONTO and the GTA, Ontario.
*
AT CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION, we specialize in NEW INSTALLATIONS of expertly PAVED RESIDENTIAL ASPHALT DRIVEWAYS, INTERLOCKING STONE, CONCRETE and NATURAL STONE.  
*
Our quality installations, attention to detail and warranties are unsurpassed.
*
We take pride in our workmanship, as well as in the planning and in the design of your project. We will enhance the beauty, comfort and curb-appeal of your home, while providing you with surface durability, added value and long lasting functionality. 

Furthermore, we can provide you with EXPERT REPAIRS to most interlocking stone, concrete and natural stone surfaces. 
*
By providing you with all of these service options, CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION eliminates your need to deal with multiple paving contractors. Your priorities are our top concerns.

We will help you to avoid extended construction project schedules and unnecessary expenses. We are always available to address any project-related questions, issues or concerns.  

We strive to provide you with professional guidance, workmanship, consultation and on-site supervision in order to make your new project experience with our paving company, a truly easy and pleasant one. 

*
All of our new ASPHALT installations come with a 1 YEAR WRITTEN INSTALLATION WARRANTY.
*
All of our new INTERLOCKING STONE installations come with a 2 YEAR WRITTEN INSTALLATION WARRANTY.
*
CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION provides a 3 YEAR WRITTEN WARRANTY on ALL new installations of NATURAL STONE and CONCRETE. 

We would be pleased to offer you A PERSONAL PROFESSIONAL CONSULTATION and A PRECISE ESTIMATE on your next planned outdoor project.
products:
Follow us on our Facebook Timeline at: Century Paving and Construction. 
View us at: Canada.ca Innovation Science and industry capability and on LinkedIn Canada.
services: The installation of paved asphalt driveways, Interlocking Stone,Stamped Concrete, Natural Stone and of concrete surfaces. We also provide REPAIRS to interlocking stone, concrete and to most natural stone surfaces.
brands:
We deal with some of the best manufacturers and suppliers of interlocking stone, including : UNILOCK, BEST WAY STONE, TECHNO-BLOCK, RB, ALLAN BLOCK, PERMACON & OAKS. 
Beaver Valley Stone is our preferred interlocking stone and NATURAL STONE supplier.
specialities:
Prior to paving, we can provide you with : EXPERT REPAIRS and ADJUSTMENTS to interlocking stone,natural stone and concrete surfaces. 
  We provide our much valued clients with additional options and choices to suit any budget and priority. 
You can be sure that all repairs and adjustments will be completed before the scheduled installation of asphalt or of any other adjacent surfaces. Scheduling, preparation and timing are some of the key elements for a successful and well coordinated,outdoor paving and landscaping project.
name: Century Paving And Construction

profile: Masterbuild windows and doors established in 1999 in toronto  . We provide professional instalation services on windows and doors replacement all across  GTA   .  Which includes building bay windows ,  brick  and concrete cut outs ,   aluminum glass enclosures , European tilt and turn windows , comertial windows and doors , garage doors , interior doors. multiple windows styles and glass options , triple glass with LowE glass and argon gas , foam field vinyl windows frames and more . All types and styles  of exterior doors  from steel and fiberglass doors to a solid wood doors with any style of stained glass designs  or wrought iron Disign finished any colour , with  any type of trim  and with hundreds of hardware choices to choose from   . Our locally  manufactured windows and doors all comes with highest energy ratings in canada . And all been tested for wind , water , heat , cold and pressure by energy star  . All of our windows and doors are installed by our in house friendly licensed insured and certified installers  with minimum of 15 years experience in a trade and compliments by a life time warranty  , one of the best warranties on the market  today . We provide a free no obligation in home professional  consultations or a tour at our showroom  . We have thousands of Successfully completed projects across ontario in the last over 20 years with thousands of  satisfied home owners . Call  us now to get best results , guaranteed energy savings and a pleasant windows and doors replacement experience .

Crest Top Group Inc. is a comprehensive landscaping and paving company with years of experience. The company takes honesty as its tenet, pays attention to quality, and provides professional services to customers with innovative design and construction knowledge. The company has always been aiming at "Building your dream home with our hands", from product to solution, from pre-assessment to after-sales service, and strive to achieve the ultimate in every aspect.

After years of hard work, we not only have a team with skilled and standardized management, but also maintain friendly and cooperative relations with various high-quality construction and materials companies in the field, and have won wide recognition and high praise from customers. The company also uses 5 million commercial engineering insurance as a guarantee of your confidence, so you have no worries.

profile:
Maximum Driveway Care has always operated under strong values aimed at exceeding client needs. Our communication channels are always open—our relationship with our clients begins on the first day of contact, and only ends once they’re fully satisfied with our work.

When you hire our services, you can count on us for the results you want and need. Get in touch today, and discover the advantage of working with Maximum Driveway Care.



We offer driveway maintenance in Newmarket, Aurora, and other nearby towns. Our main priority is customer satisfaction. The job is only done when the customer is happy. All spring is 10% off driveway sealing. We also offer asphalt repair jobs. Call to book a free estimate.
